message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has immense potential value. While I can't disclose specifics, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me.  I'm confident it would be even more valuable in the right hands.  I'm willing to part with it for a price of $2000000.  Consider this a chance to secure a significant asset.  Please let me know your decision.
